author: Dominic Przybylski
message: Empowerment (regardless of race) is based on individual effort. i.e. self-empowerment. Anything else is a farce and an open invitation to corruption. "I spoke to Exon executive in apartheid days and asked why he wasn't doing business in SA. His answer was that in rest of Africa they could do what they like if they pay bribes "Is all part of becoming a standard African country where corruption rules - ""decolonisation""" I was friendly with a PAC member just after they were unbanned. He had a whole lot of Nigerian friends who became directors in all the big companies based on BEE. Local blacks were too slow. Perspective of morality is very different between Europe and Africa. European morality is based on merit. African morality based on benifitting family/tribe/race ahead of merit. @DJ DJ He'll find a way to avoid it. Sudden illness is my guess. Oath means nothing to JZ "If he does appear I expect him to refuse to answer questions We paying pension for him and his 5 wives at nearly same amount as when he was president. Is why he eventually gave up presidency. Alternative was impeachment where he would lose his pension and continuing perks. Not sure @Born free. Depends if/what he is found guilty of. Guptas taught him and Dudu Myeni how to hide evidence by never putting anything in writing. He was trained by KGB Yup all in ANC indoctrinated by USSR
